name: Kalli
content:
**Mechanics**: Blighted Plates, Kalli’s Ontological Weapon, Safety Shelters  Overview:
• Complete the six Blighted Plates as indicated by the symbols around the center pit
• Avoid Kalli’s Ontological Weapon using the Safety Shelters
• Defeat Kalli the Corrupted

The arena is a big, low-ceilinged cave with nine plates around its perimeter.  In the center of the room is a pit, where three pairs of these symbols are visible.  Those six symbols can be found around the edges of the encounter over the plates.  There will also be plates with symbols not displayed around the center pit, avoid these.
